alert.note: Alert for Central and Southeast Howard; Southern Baltimore (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 28 at 4:06AM EST until January 29 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 10 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Southern Baltimore and Central and Southeast Howard Counties. * WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 10 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.

area.areaDesc: Central and Southeast Howard; Southern Baltimore
